42 #ifndef TEUCHOS_SERIALIZATION_TRAITS_HELPERS_HPP
43 #define TEUCHOS_SERIALIZATION_TRAITS_HELPERS_HPP
44 
45 #include "Teuchos_SerializationTraits.hpp"
46 #include "Teuchos_ArrayView.hpp"
47 #include "Teuchos_Array.hpp"

49 namespace Teuchos {
50 
58 template <typename Ordinal, typename T>
59 class DefaultSerializer {
60 public:
61 
63  typedef SerializationTraits<Ordinal,T> DefaultSerializerType;
64 
66  static DefaultSerializerType& getDefaultSerializer() {
67  if (defaultSerializer_ == Teuchos::null)
68  defaultSerializer_ = Teuchos::rcp(new DefaultSerializerType);
69  return *defaultSerializer_;
70  }
71 
73  static Teuchos::RCP<DefaultSerializerType> getDefaultSerializerRCP() {
74  if (defaultSerializer_ == Teuchos::null)
75  defaultSerializer_ = Teuchos::rcp(new DefaultSerializerType);
76  return defaultSerializer_;
77  }
78 
79 private:
80 
82  static Teuchos::RCP<DefaultSerializerType> defaultSerializer_;
83 };
84 
85 template <typename Ordinal, typename T>
86 Teuchos::RCP<typename DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::DefaultSerializerType>
87 DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::defaultSerializer_ = Teuchos::null;
88 
96 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer,
97  bool direct = Serializer::supportsDirectSerialization>
98 class ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp {};
99 
107 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer,
108  bool direct = Serializer::supportsDirectSerialization>
109 class ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp {};
110 
119 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer,
120  bool direct = Serializer::supportsDirectSerialization>
121 class ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp {};
122 
131 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer,
132  bool direct = Serializer::supportsDirectSerialization>
133 class ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp {};
134 
140 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
141 class ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true> {
142 public:
144  ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp(
145  const Ordinal count, T buffer[],
146  const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
147  );
151  ~ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp();
153  char* getCharBuffer() const;
155  Ordinal getBytes() const;
157  const ArrayView<char> getCharBufferView() const;
158 private:
159  Ordinal count_;
160  T *buffer_;
161  Ordinal bytes_;
162  char *charBuffer_;
163  RCP<const Serializer> serializer_;
164  // Not defined and not to be called
165  ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp();
166  ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp(const ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp&);
167  ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp& operator=(const ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp&);
168 };
169 
175 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
176 class ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true> {
177 public:
179  ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp(
180  const Ordinal count, const T buffer[],
181  const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
182  );
186  ~ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp();
188  const char* getCharBuffer() const;
190  Ordinal getBytes() const;
192  const ArrayView<const char> getCharBufferView() const;
193 private:
194  Ordinal count_;
195  const T *buffer_;
196  Ordinal bytes_;
197  const char *charBuffer_;
198  RCP<const Serializer> serializer_;
199  // Not defined and not to be called
200  ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp();
201  ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp(const ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp&);
202  ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp& operator=(const ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp&);
203 };
204 
211 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
212 class ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true> {
213 public:
215  ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp(
216  const Ordinal bytes, char charBuffer[],
217  const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
218  );
222  ~ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp();

226  Ordinal getCount() const;
227 private:
228  Ordinal bytes_;
229  char *charBuffer_;

231  T *buffer_;
232  RCP<const Serializer> serializer_;
233  // Not defined and not to be called
234  ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp();
235  ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp(const ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp&);
236  ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp& operator=(const ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp&);
237 };

278 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
279 class ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false> {
280 public:
282  ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp(
283  const Ordinal count, T buffer[],
284  const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
285  );
289  ~ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp();
291  char* getCharBuffer() const;
293  Ordinal getBytes() const;
295  const ArrayView<char> getCharBufferView() const;
296 private:
297  Ordinal count_;
298  T *buffer_;
299  Ordinal bytes_;
300  mutable Array<char> charBuffer_;
301  RCP<const Serializer> serializer_;
302  // Not defined and not to be called
303  ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp();
304  ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp(const ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp&);
305  ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp& operator=(const ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp&);
306 };

415 template <typename Ordinal, typename T,
416  typename Serializer = typename DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::DefaultSerializerType>
417 class ValueTypeSerializationBuffer :
418  public ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer> {
419 public:
420  typedef ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer> Base;
422  ValueTypeSerializationBuffer(
423  const Ordinal count, T buffer[],
424  const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
425  ) : Base(count,buffer,serializer) {}
426 };
427 
431 template <typename Ordinal, typename T,
432  typename Serializer = typename DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::DefaultSerializerType>
433 class ConstValueTypeSerializationBuffer :
434  public ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer> {
435 public:
436  typedef ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer> Base;
438  ConstValueTypeSerializationBuffer(
439  const Ordinal count, const T buffer[],
440  const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
441  ) : Base(count,buffer,serializer) {}
442 };

450 class ValueTypeDeserializationBuffer :

452 public:

456  const Ordinal bytes, char charBuffer[],
457  const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer

465 template <typename Ordinal, typename T,
466  typename Serializer = typename DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::DefaultSerializerType>
467 class ConstValueTypeDeserializationBuffer :
468  public ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer> {
469 public:
470  typedef ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer> Base;
472  ConstValueTypeDeserializationBuffer(
473  const Ordinal bytes, const char charBuffer[],
474  const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer

484 template <typename Ordinal, typename T>
485 class ValueTypeSerializationBuffer<Ordinal,T,typename DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::DefaultSerializerType> :
486  public ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,typename DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::DefaultSerializerType> {
487 public:
488  typedef DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T> DS; // work around for parsing bug in gcc 4.1-4.2
489  typedef typename DS::DefaultSerializerType Serializer;
490  typedef ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer> Base;
492  ValueTypeSerializationBuffer(
493  const Ordinal count, T buffer[],
494  const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer = DS::getDefaultSerializerRCP()
495  ) : Base(count,buffer,serializer) {}
496 };
497 
504 template <typename Ordinal, typename T>
505 class ConstValueTypeSerializationBuffer<Ordinal,T,typename DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::DefaultSerializerType> :
506  public ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,typename DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::DefaultSerializerType> {
507 public:
508  typedef DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T> DS; // work around for parsing bug in gcc 4.1-4.2
509  typedef typename DS::DefaultSerializerType Serializer;
510  typedef ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer> Base;
512  ConstValueTypeSerializationBuffer(
513  const Ordinal count, const T buffer[],
514  const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer = DS::getDefaultSerializerRCP()
515  ) : Base(count,buffer,serializer) {}
516 };
517

528 public:
529  typedef DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T> DS; // work around for parsing bug in gcc 4.1-4.2
530  typedef typename DS::DefaultSerializerType Serializer;
531  typedef ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer> Base;
533  ValueTypeDeserializationBuffer(

546 template <typename Ordinal, typename T>
547 class ConstValueTypeDeserializationBuffer<Ordinal,T,typename DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::DefaultSerializerType> :
548  public ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,typename DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T>::DefaultSerializerType> {
549 public:
550  typedef DefaultSerializer<Ordinal,T> DS; // work around for parsing bug in gcc 4.1-4.2
551  typedef typename DS::DefaultSerializerType Serializer;
552  typedef ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer> Base;
554  ConstValueTypeDeserializationBuffer(
555  const Ordinal bytes, const char charBuffer[],
556  const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer = DS::getDefaultSerializerRCP()
557  ) : Base(bytes,charBuffer,serializer) {}

560 // /////////////////////////////////////
561 // Template implementations for direct serialization
562 
563 //
564 // ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp
565 //
566 
567 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
568 ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
569 ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp(
570  const Ordinal count, T buffer[], const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
571  )
572  :count_(count), buffer_(buffer), serializer_(serializer)
573 {
574  bytes_ = serializer_->fromCountToDirectBytes(count_);
575  charBuffer_ = serializer_->convertToCharPtr(buffer_);
576 }
577 
578 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
579 ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
580 ~ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp()
581 {
582  // There is nothing to do since the type uses direct serialization!
583 }
584 
585 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
586 char* ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
587 getCharBuffer() const
588 {
589  return charBuffer_;
590 }
591 
592 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
593 Ordinal ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
594 getBytes() const
595 {
596  return bytes_;
597 }
598 
599 
600 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
601 const ArrayView<char>
602 ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
603 getCharBufferView() const
604 {
605  return arrayView(charBuffer_, bytes_);
606 }
607 
608 
609 //
610 // ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp
611 //
612 
613 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
614 ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
615 ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp(
616  const Ordinal count, const T buffer[], const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
617  )
618  :count_(count), buffer_(buffer), serializer_(serializer)
619 {
620  bytes_ = serializer_->fromCountToDirectBytes(count_);
621  charBuffer_ = serializer_->convertToCharPtr(buffer_);
622 }
623 
624 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
625 ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
626 ~ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp()
627 {
628  // There is nothing to do since the type uses direct serialization!
629 }

631 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>

634 {
635  return charBuffer_;
636 }
637 
638 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
639 Ordinal ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
640 getBytes() const

642  return bytes_;
643 }

646 const ArrayView<const char>
647 ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
648 getCharBufferView() const
649 {
650  return arrayView(charBuffer_, bytes_);
651 }

653 //
654 // ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp

656 
657 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
658 ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
659 ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp(
660  const Ordinal bytes, char charBuffer[], const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
661  )
662  :bytes_(bytes), charBuffer_(charBuffer), serializer_(serializer)
663 {
664  count_ = serializer_->fromDirectBytesToCount(bytes_);
665  buffer_ = serializer_->convertFromCharPtr(charBuffer_);
666 }
667 
668 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
669 ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
670 ~ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp()
671 {
672  // There is nothing to do since the type uses direct serialization!
673 }
674 
675 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
676 T* ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
677 getBuffer() const
678 {
679  return buffer_;
680 }
681 
682 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
683 Ordinal ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
684 getCount() const
685 {
686  return count_;
687 }

693 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
694 ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::
695 ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp(
696  const Ordinal bytes, const char charBuffer[], const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
697  )
698  :bytes_(bytes), charBuffer_(charBuffer), serializer_(serializer)
699 {
700  count_ = serializer_->fromDirectBytesToCount(bytes_);
701  buffer_ = serializer_->convertFromCharPtr(charBuffer_);
702 }
703

709 }

711 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
712 const T* ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,true>::

718 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>

726 // /////////////////////////////////////
727 // Template implementations for indirect specializations
728 
729 //
730 // ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp
731 //
732 
733 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
734 ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
735 ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp(
736  const Ordinal count, T buffer[], const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
737  )
738  :count_(count), buffer_(buffer), serializer_(serializer)
739 {
740  bytes_ = serializer_->fromCountToIndirectBytes(count_, buffer_);
741  charBuffer_.resize(bytes_);
742  serializer_->serialize(count_, buffer_, bytes_, &charBuffer_[0]);
743 }
744 
745 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
746 ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
747 ~ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp()
748 {
749  serializer_->deserialize(bytes_, &charBuffer_[0], count_, buffer_);
750 }
751 
752 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
753 char* ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
754 getCharBuffer() const
755 {
756  return &charBuffer_[0];
757 }
758 
759 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
760 Ordinal ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
761 getBytes() const
762 {
763  return bytes_;
764 }
765 
766 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
767 const ArrayView<char>
768 ValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
769 getCharBufferView() const
770 {
771  return charBuffer_.view(0, bytes_);
772 }
773 
774 
775 //
776 // ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp
777 //
778 
779 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
780 ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
781 ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp(
782  const Ordinal count, const T buffer[], const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
783  )
784  :count_(count), buffer_(buffer), serializer_(serializer)
785 {
786  bytes_ = serializer_->fromCountToIndirectBytes(count_, buffer_);
787  charBuffer_.resize(bytes_);
788  serializer_->serialize(count_, buffer_, bytes_, &charBuffer_[0]);
789 }
790 
791 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
792 ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
793 ~ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp()
794 {
795 }
796 
797 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
798 const char* ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
799 getCharBuffer() const
800 {
801  return &charBuffer_[0];
802 }
803 
804 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
805 Ordinal ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
806 getBytes() const
807 {
808  return bytes_;
809 }
810 
811 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
812 const ArrayView<const char>
813 ConstValueTypeSerializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
814 getCharBufferView() const
815 {
816  return charBuffer_.view(0, bytes_);
817 }
818 
819 //
820 // ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp
821 //
822 
823 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
824 ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
825 ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp(
826  const Ordinal bytes, char charBuffer[], const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
827  )
828  :bytes_(bytes), charBuffer_(charBuffer), serializer_(serializer)
829 {
830  count_ = serializer_->fromIndirectBytesToCount(bytes_, charBuffer_);
831  buffer_.resize(count_);
832  serializer_->deserialize(bytes_, charBuffer_, count_, &buffer_[0]);
833 }
834 
835 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
836 ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
837 ~ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp()
838 {
839  serializer_->serialize(count_, &buffer_[0], bytes_, charBuffer_);
840 }
841 
842 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
843 T* ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
844 getBuffer() const
845 {
846  return &buffer_[0];
847 }
848 
849 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
850 Ordinal ValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
851 getCount() const
852 {
853  return count_;
854 }

856 //
857 // ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp
858 //
859 
860 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
861 ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
862 ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp(
863  const Ordinal bytes, const char charBuffer[], const RCP<const Serializer>& serializer
864  )
865  :bytes_(bytes), charBuffer_(charBuffer), serializer_(serializer)
866 {
867  count_ = serializer_->fromIndirectBytesToCount(bytes_, charBuffer_);
868  buffer_.resize(count_);
869  serializer_->deserialize(bytes_, charBuffer_, count_, &buffer_[0]);
870 }
871 
872 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
873 ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
874 ~ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp()
875 {
876 }
877 
878 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
879 const T* ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
880 getBuffer() const
881 {
882  return &buffer_[0];
883 }
884 
885 template <typename Ordinal, typename T, typename Serializer>
886 Ordinal ConstValueTypeDeserializationBufferImp<Ordinal,T,Serializer,false>::
887 getCount() const
888 {
889  return count_;
890 }
891
